_header: Honoured be Thou Jesu our Saviour
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Angels’ song on Easter Day, in the English translation of the Pèlerinage de l’âme — five stanzas rhyme royal

Bod770.First Lines:
Honourid be þou ihesu our saviourþat for mankinde were
                    don on rode…
Bod770.Last Lines:
…þat an þe wel & ground of all vertuHonourid be
                    þou blisful lord ihesu
Bod770.Attributed Title: þe song of angele on ester day (f. 95)

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
Honowryd be þowe Ihesu owre saueowreThat for mankynd wer doon
                    vppon þe roode…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…That art þe well & grounde of all vertueHonowred be
                    þowe blessid lord Ihesu

CamGon124.First Lines:
honowred be þow Jhesu sauiourþat for mankynde were don
                    opon þe rode…
CamGon124.Last Lines:
…þat art þe welle & grownde of alle
                    vertuhonowred be þow blysful lord Jhesu
CamGon124.Attributed Title: tho aungeles songen vp on astir daye (p. 240)

CULKk17.First Lines:
Honourid be þou Jhesu saueourThat for mankynde wer don vp on
                    þe roode…
CULKk17.Last Lines:
…That art þe welle & ground of al uertuhonouryd be
                    þou blysful lord Jhesu
CULKk17.Attributed Title:
her endith þe drem of þe pilgrimage of þe soule (f.
                        124v)

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Honoure be þou ihesuoure saueoure þat for man kinde were
                    done on þe rode…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…þou arte þe welle and grounde of all vertuhonourede
                    be þou blessede lorde ihesu

BLAdd37049.Editions:
Doty,  Brant Lee,
                        ed.  
             “An Edition of British Museum MS Additional 37049: a Religious
                Miscellany.” 
         Diss. Michigan State, 1969: 419.

BLEge615.First Lines: HOnured be thu Ihu saueoureþat for mankende were do on the rode…
BLEge615.Last Lines: …Thu art the ground & welle of alle vertueHonured be thu blisful lord Ihu
BLEge615.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             “Hoccleve’s Works: The Regement of Princes and fourteen minor

NYPLSpenc19.First Lines:
Honoured be thow Ihesu saueourThat for mankynde were don on the
                    rode…
NYPLSpenc19.Last Lines:
…That art the grounde and welle of all vertuhonoured be thow
                    blesful lord Ihesu
NYPLSpenc19.Attributed Title: The aungeles song vpon ester day (f. 128)
